title: The Amazonification of the American workforce
description:
We can’t deny it, we all love free shipping. But Amazon’s dominance has turned this former perk into the new industry standard. Recode senior correspondent Jason Del Rey explains what this “Amazonification” of the American workforce means. 

Read Jason’s story: https://www.vox.com/the-highlight/22977660/amazon-warehouses-work-injuries-retail-labor 

Today’s episode was produced and engineered by Sofi LaLonde, and hosted by Adam Clark Estes.
